page.title: 06Food
page.content: {Fish and chips} is a favourite savoury meal. The fish is dipped in a batter of flour and water then fried in hot deep fat until it is crisp. The chips are potatoes which are peeled and cut into fingers then fried in hot deep fat until golden. {Fish fingers} are small finger shaped portions of cod covered with bread crumbs then fried. {Bacon and egg} is a tasty breakfast meal made by cracking an egg into a frying pan with a little fat. Cook until the white sets and fry the slices of bacon in the same pan. {Mince} is meat cut by a machine into long thin strings which break into crumbs. It can then be cooked and served in various ways. A microwave oven is popular as it can be used to cook, or re-heat food, very quickly. {Ice cream} is a popular dessert.
